parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Ephraim -- a son of Joseph, also his descendants and their territory
Manasseh -- 'causing to forget', a son of Joseph, also a king of Judah, also two Israelites
Joseph -- 'he increases', a son of Jacob, also the name of several Israelites

parse: Conjunctive waw | Verb - Qal - Consecutive imperfect - third person masculine plural
str2: To inherit, to occupy, to bequeath, distribute, instate
